page.title: 12CARE OF THE ELDERLY
page.content: There are two {nursing homes}one owned privately, one council controlled. Plans have been passed for another private home to be in Middlegate Road. These provide residential care with limited medical attention provided by qualified nursing staff, with local doctors on call in emergencies. Those needing specialised treatment are transferred to the local hospital. {Woodlands Court Private Nursing Home} has opened in 1985. It has 27 beds, staffed by a matron, 1 state registered nurse and 4 orderlies supported by some voluntary helpers so giving 24 hour supervision. {Frampton House Old Peoples Home}has 48 beds staffed by a matron, deputy, 3 care assistants and 2 night staff. Personal laundry, hair care and chiropody services are provided.
